game.name: Hang Down
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Camera Comfort, Color Alternatives, Custom Volume Controls, Playable without Timed Input, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: A solo adventure where you must weave your way to the bottom of a dangerous pit with nothing but a rope and sheer determination. Can you reach the bottom?
game.shortDescriptionEn: A solo adventure where you must weave your way to the bottom of a dangerous pit with nothing but a rope and sheer determination. Can you reach the bottom?
